name: Keep Him Alive (Lamossus)
description:
Night. Street. You hear an angry roar just beside you. But then you see a distant light, a promise of safety. Your wounded ally is tired and can barely walk, let alone defend himself. Will this mansion become your shelter for these hard times or will it attract more unpleasant guests?

Survive through hordes of zombies, barricade yourself and most importantly KEEP HIM ALIVE.

Coding by Lamossus

Art by DiW527

Credits for audio can be found in readme.txt file.
